contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 1, 2011 D Dutch Open Brass Band Championship
Dutch Open Brass Band Championship [2011] 1000 Set Test and Own Choice World Music Contest Kerkrade dutch-open-brass-band-championship
Set Test and Entertainments Contest
Music for Battle Creek
Rodahal, Kerkrade, Limburg, Netherlands Each band played 60-minute concert programme, including set test piece Music for Battle Creek (Philip Sparke).
This one-off contest was held under the auspices of the WMC Kerkrade, and is not in sequence with the series of Dutch Open contests that began in 2015.
Oct. 2, 2011, 5:49 p.m. Dec. 22, 2015, 2:25 p.m.

2 Brassband Buizingen Luc Vertommen
3 Brass Band Willebroek Frans Violet Masquerade [Wilby]
4 Brass Band Heist Bert van Thienen Equilibrium
5 Festival Brass Band Manu Mellaerts From Ancient Times
